sys_variable_value.value:
Hello  ${approver.first_name},

    Recently Expense approval request is created with Number: ${number} by the user Employee  name ${employee.first_name} with 
email: ${employee.email}.

Your Regards,

Employee First name: ${employee.first_name}

Employee  Email: ${employee.email}
When the expense request is created by employee
